statements: SELECT * FROM GeneticMutations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, mutation_type FROM GeneticMutations WHERE experiment_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM GeneticMutations WHERE mutation_type = 'Substitution';
SELECT mutation_description FROM GeneticMutations WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
SELECT id, researcher_name, mutation_description FROM GeneticMutations WHERE mutation_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM GeneticMutations WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT researcher_name, mutation_type FROM GeneticMutations ORDER BY mutation_type DESC;
SELECT id, researcher_name, mutation_description FROM GeneticMutations WHERE experiment_id > 100 AND mutation_type = 'Insertion';
SELECT * FROM GeneticMutations WHERE mutation_description LIKE '%deletion%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_mutations, mutation_type FROM GeneticMutations GROUP BY mutation_type HAVING total_mutations > 5;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE mutation_type = 'deletion';
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researchers WHERE department = 'Biology';
SELECT mutation_type, mutation_value FROM experiments WHERE researcher_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE mutation_value > 0.5 ORDER BY mutation_value DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, institution FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE mutation_value > 0.5 ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, institution, department FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE mutation_type = 'deletion' AND mutation_value BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5;
SELECT researcher_name, institution, department, researcher_id FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM experiments JOIN researchers ON experiments.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM experiment;
SELECT experiment_id, mutation_id, researcher_id FROM experiment;
SELECT researcher_name, organization FROM researcher ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT mutation_description, mutation_date FROM mutation WHERE mutation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, mutation_description FROM researcher JOIN mutation ON researcher.researcher_id = mutation.mutation_id;
SELECT * FROM experiment WHERE mutation_type = 'Deletion' ORDER BY experiment_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) AS num_experiments FROM experiment JOIN researcher ON experiment.researcher_id = researcher.researcher_id GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING num_experiments > 2;

SELECT experiment_id, researcher_name, mutation_description FROM experiment JOIN researcher ON experiment.researcher_id = researcher.researcher_id JOIN mutation ON experiment.mutation_id = mutation.mutation_id WHERE mutation_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT mutation_description, researcher_name, organization FROM mutation JOIN experiment ON mutation.mutation_id = experiment.mutation_id JOIN researcher ON experiment.researcher_id = researcher.researcher_id WHERE organization = 'Research Lab';

SELECT experiment_id, mutation_description FROM experiment JOIN mutation ON experiment.mutation_id = mutation.mutation_id WHERE mutation_description LIKE '%Insertion%' ORDER BY experiment_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT name, institution FROM Researchers;
SELECT e_id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM Experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT mutation_type, mutation_description FROM Mutations WHERE m_id = 1;
SELECT r_id, name FROM Researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers ORDER BY name DESC, institution ASC
SELECT r_id, name, institution FROM Researchers WHERE institution='University'
SELECT e_id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM Experiments WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND experiment_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Mutations WHERE mutation_type='Substitution' OR mutation_type='Deletion'
SELECT m_id, mutation_type, mutation_description FROM MutationsData INNER JOIN Mutations ON MutationsData.m_id = Mutations.m_id
SELECT * FROM mutations ORDER BY mutation_count DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, research_field FROM researchers WHERE research_field IN ('Genetics', 'Biology');
SELECT institution_name, location, founding_year FROM institutions WHERE founding_year < 1900;
SELECT mutation_type, mutation_count FROM mutations WHERE mutation_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE mutation_count > 10;
SELECT id, mutation_type FROM mutations WHERE mutation_count < 5 ORDER BY mutation_count ASC;
SELECT m.id, m.mutation_type, r.researcher_name FROM mutations m JOIN researchers r ON m.researcher_id = r.id WHERE r.research_field = 'Genetics';
SELECT e.experiment_name, r.researcher_name, e.experiment_date FROM experiments e JOIN researchers r ON e.researcher_id = r.id WHERE e.experiment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.researcher_name, i.institution_name, i.location FROM researchers r JOIN institutions i ON r.institution = i.id WHERE r.research_field = 'Biology';
